name: One Design System Promo
description:
Download Full Version

https://spline.gumroad.com/l/oneds



One design system was created to develop the design of dashboards, web interfaces and sites. We tried to make it the most flexible and functional for creating complex designs. The system includes basic web controls, ui components and icons. A large number of text styles and colors will allow you to customize your interface. The system is in beta testing and will be further developed, new samples and components will be added. The design of the system is developed in figma using its functions and features.
